Any creature besides the creature who made the jump within the area must make a Constitution Saving Throw, on a failed save becoming deafened and taking 3d8 thunder damage, or taking half as much damage on a successful save and not becoming deafened.  A deafened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the spell deals an additional 1d8 for each slot above 2nd.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: You touch a creature within range, surrounding your fist in lightning and thunder.  The target must make a Constitution Saving Throw.  On a failed save the target takes 5d6 lightning damage and 5d6 thunder damage and is pushed back 20 ft.  On a successful save the target takes half damage and is pushed back only 10 ft.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher the spell deals an additional 1d6 lightning and thunder damage for each slot above 6th.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: Necrotic energies radiate from you, necrotic tentacles floating around you in a ten foot sphere.  Creatures within the sphere must make a Constitution Saving Throw, on a failed saving throw taking 3d6 necrotic damage and becoming restrained.  On a successful saving throw a creature takes half as much damage and is not restrained.  A restrained creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the spell deals an additional 1d6 necrotic damage for each slot above 3rd.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: Necrotic energies seep off of your hand.  Make an attack roll against a creature within range.  On a hit, you deal 4d6 necrotic damage and the target must make a Constitution Saving Throw, becoming paralyzed on a failed save as necrotic energies prevent them from moving.  A paralyzed creature may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns turns.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the spell deals an additional 1d6 necrotic damage for each slot above 4th.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: You create a form of living shadows in your hand which you then attempt to pass on to someone else.  Make a melee spell attack against a creature within range.  On a hit, you deal 6d6 necrotic damage, and can use an action on subsequent turns to deal an additional 6d6 necrotic damage.  Additionally, the target must make a Constitution Saving Throw or become blinded.  A blinded creature can attempt the saving throw again at the end of each of its turns.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: When you cast this spell using a slot of 7th level or higher the spell deals an additional 1d6 for each slot above 6th.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: You conjure a spectral sword made of shadows and darkness that appears in your hand.  You can use this sword to make a melee spell attack roll as an action, on a hit dealing 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier necrotic damage.

description_library.heading: At Higher Levels
description_library.content: Whenever you cast this spell at higher levels it deals an additional 1d8 necrotic damage for every level above 1st at which it is cast.

description_library.heading: Mechanics
description_library.content: You push your body beyond the limits of what it is normally capable and dash 60 feet in any direction, ignoring any creatures blocking your path.  As you dash you leave a trail of necrotic ooze behind you.  The area is considered difficult terrain and any creature that starts its turn there takes 5d6 necrotic damage.  The terrain naturally returns to normal after ten minutes.
